title: Charlie Brear - sans serif font ID (stencil)
content:
Looking for a font ID on this sans serif stencil-style font used for the Charlie Brear logo. Many thanks in advance for any help!

Best,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-11-18%20at%2011_5085.55.43%20AM.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-11-18 at 11.55.43 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-11-18%20at%2011.55.43%20AM.png) | 20.26 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
Couldn’t find a match, but Ryu Gothic and Kozuka Gothic are both very close, and would only require minor editing to achieve the look:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/ryo-gothic-plus-n/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/ryo-gothic-plus-n/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/ryo-gothic-plus-n/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/kozuka-gothic-pr6n/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/kozuka-gothic-pr6n/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/kozuka-gothic-pr6n/")

Myriad Pro is a close second:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/")

I have the feeling it has been started out with b+p [SangBleu](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230/http:/www.swisstypefaces.com/fonts/sangbleu) Sans. 2 samples from Charlie Brear website that may confirm this hunch: [http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0194/0373/t/12/assets/HPRTWAW15.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230/http:/cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0194/0373/t/12/assets/HPRTWAW15.jpg "http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0194/0373/t/12/assets/HPRTWAW15.jpg"), [http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0194/0373/t/12/assets/rtwbridalimage.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141120231230/http:/cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0194/0373/t/12/assets/rtwbridalimage.jpg "http://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0194/0373/t/12/assets/rtwbridalimage.jpg")
thanks for the sleuth work guys!
